languages.text: {n}Пятно понимает вас! Оно отвечает заливистым смехом, щекоча воздух щупальцами так, что само пространство вторит хохотом.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пятно понимает вас! Оно отвечает заливистым смехом, щекоча воздух щупальцами так, что само пространство вторит хохотом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs back, its tentacles tickling the air so hard that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs back, its tentacles tickling the air so hard that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
{n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La silhouette vous comprend ! Elle vous répond en riant elle aussi et ses tentacules chatouillent l'air si énergiquement que l'espace autour d'elle éclate de rire à son tour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette vous comprend ! Elle vous répond en riant elle aussi et ses tentacules chatouillent l'air si énergiquement que l'espace autour d'elle éclate de rire à son tour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}¡La masa te entiende! Se ríe en respuesta y sus tentáculos acarician el aire con tanta energía que el espacio que los rodea también empieza a reírse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}¡La masa te entiende! Se ríe en respuesta y sus tentáculos acarician el aire con tanta energía que el espacio que los rodea también empieza a reírse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的斑点理解了你的意思！它也开始大笑着回应你，它的触手咯吱着周围的空气，就连空间本身都开始放声大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的斑点理解了你的意思！它也开始大笑着回应你，它的触手咯吱着周围的空气，就连空间本身都开始放声大笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}塊は、あなたの言うことを理解している！答えの代わりに笑っている。触手が空気をくすぐるように元気に動くため、周りの空間も笑い出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}塊は、あなたの言うことを理解している！答えの代わりに笑っている。触手が空気をくすぐるように元気に動くため、周りの空間も笑い出した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Blob versteht dich! Er lacht nur, und seine Tentakeln kitzeln die Luft so energisch, dass der Raum um ihn herum ebenfalls zu lachen anfängt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Blob versteht dich! Er lacht nur, und seine Tentakeln kitzeln die Luft so energisch, dass der Raum um ihn herum ebenfalls zu lachen anfängt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kütle seni anlıyor! Karşılık olarak o da gülüyor ve dokungaçları havayı o kadar enerjik şekilde gıdıklıyor ki çevresindeki alan da gülmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blob can understand you! It laughs in response, and its tentacles tickle the air so energetically that the space around it starts laughing too.{/n}
